snippet.title: Dune 2 - The Legacy - Ordos - gameplay
snippet.description:
Dune Legacy is a cross platform remake of the excellent Dune II, the game which ploughed the way for and was a forefather to the whole real time strategy genre.

While not the first real-time strategy (RTS) game (The Ancient Art of War, Stonkers, and Herzog Zwei all preceded it), Dune II established a format that would be followed for years to come, and was the first to use the mouse to move units, allowing players to fluidly interact with their troops. As such, Dune II was the first modern real-time strategy game. Striking a balance between complexity and innovation, it was a huge success and laid the foundation for the coming Command & Conquer, the Warcraft series, and many other RTS games. - wikipedia

Note that this screencast shows Dune Legacy version 0.95b2 - an outdated version of this remake. The current project, although unplayable yet, is in active development and has been renamed to Doon Lunacy. Keep track of it here:
https://code.launchpad.net/doonlunacy

Game: Dune Legacy v0.95b2
Website: http://dunelegacy.sourceforge.net/wiki/index.php/Main_Page
System: Gentoo 64
Recorded with: qt-recordmydesktop
Date: 2009-08-26
